zone.line: All things confess his strength--From the cold
Through the cold mass
Of marble & of colour his dreams pass
Bright threads, whence mothers
And Mothers gazing weave the robes their children
wear;
Language is a perpetual Orphic song

The Lightning is his slave; Heavens utmost deep
Gives up her stars, & like a flock of sheep
They pass before his eye, are numbered, & roll on!
The Tempest is his steed,--he strides the air!
And the abyss shouts from her depth
